trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around July 18th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving east on avenue J, just past 30th street east. We saw it appear in the sky ahead of us. We had no idea what it was. It had a large light on each end, next to the large light there was two rows of vertical lights. The large flashimg light in the middle with two small lights above and below it. The other side was the same. it didn't last long enough to have any reaction, it just disappeared.
